data.comment: Today's match is followed by 2457 spectators.
The big names in today's match at Gazovik Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Orenburg.
In Rostoshi Orenburg attack through Danijel Miskic. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Tula goal kick.
Pavel Kukuyan awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Orenburg in their own half.
Orenburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Tula have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Orenburg to take a throw-in in Tula territory.
Orenburg's Ricardo Alves misses with an attempt on goal.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Tula a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tula in the half of Orenburg.
Orenburg take a 1-0 lead thanks to Djordje Despotovic.
Ball safe as Orenburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yevgeni Lutsenko (Tula) strikes at Gazovik Stadium but his header is cleared.
Free kick Orenburg.
Gia Grigalava (Tula) gets a yellow card.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Tula in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Tula in their own half.
Corner awarded to Tula.
Tula have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Sergey Tkachyov for Tula gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Orenburg at Gazovik Stadium.
Throw-in for Orenburg at Gazovik Stadium.
Can Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orenburg's half?
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Rostoshi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Tula's Goran Causic attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Orenburg have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Orenburg in their own half.
Yevgeni Lutsenko of Tula smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Orenburg throw-in in Tula's half.
Can Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orenburg's half?
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Tula throw-in in Orenburg's half.
Orenburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Orenburg in the half of Tula.
Orenburg to take a throw-in in Tula territory.
Tula to take a throw-in in Orenburg territory.
In Rostoshi, Mamadou Sylla (Orenburg) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostoshi.
Tula drive upfield and Daniil Lesovoy gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Orenburg defender.
Corner awarded to Tula.
Tula are pushing forward but Maksim Belyaev's finish is wide of the goal.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Orenburg a goal kick.
Goal kick for Orenburg at Gazovik Stadium.
Tula needs to be cautious. Orenburg have an attacking throw-in.
Mamadou Sylla is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostoshi.
Mamadou Sylla is back on his feet again.
Pavel Kukuyan awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Orenburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goran Causic is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to Orenburg.
At Gazovik Stadium the fourth official shows that 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in high up the field for Orenburg in Rostoshi.
The first half has been concluded at Gazovik Stadium.
The second half has started at Gazovik Stadium.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Tula throw-in in Orenburg's half.
Tula make their first substitution with Alesandr Lomovitskiy replacing Daniil Lesovoy.
Free kick for Tula in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a throw-in for Tula, close to Orenburg's area.
Orenburg will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Tula.
Tula have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Free kick for Orenburg in their own half.
At Gazovik Stadium, Alesandr Lomovitskiy for the away team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
Can Orenburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tula's half?
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Tula in their own half.
Islambek Kuat for Orenburg has been booked by Pavel Kukuyan and receives a first yellow card.
Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Tula have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Tula's Victor Alvarez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Orenburg defender.
Throw-in for Orenburg in their own half.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Tula.
Can Tula capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Orenburg's half?
Tula are coming forward and Goran Causic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Orenburg have a goal kick.
Orenburg's Sergey Terekhov gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tula goal kick.
In Rostoshi, Victor Alvarez of Tula is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Free kick for Orenburg in their own half.
Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Konstantin Emelianov is making the team's first substitution at Gazovik Stadium with Joel Fameyeh replacing Mamadou Sylla.
Important block from the Tula defence as Djordje Despotovic fires in a strike for Orenburg.
Throw-in for Orenburg in the half of Tula.
Throw-in for Orenburg close to the penalty box.
Islambek Kuat for Orenburg is back on the field again.
The match at Gazovik Stadium has been interrupted briefly for a check on Islambek Kuat, who is down injured.
Filip Rogic (Orenburg) has replaced the possibly injured Islambek Kuat at Gazovik Stadium.
Tula's Alesandr Lomovitskiy has run offside.
Free kick in a good position for Orenburg!
At Gazovik Stadium, Robert Bauer has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In Rostoshi, Uros Radakovic (Orenburg) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Joel Fameyeh's header is off-target for Orenburg.
Ball goes out of play for a Tula goal kick.
Tula needs to be cautious. Orenburg have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Tula at Gazovik Stadium.
Throw-in Tula.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Orenburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tula's half?
Free kick for Orenburg in the half of Tula.
Kirill Kombarov (Tula) has received a first yellow card.
Orenburg's Joel Fameyeh breaks free at Gazovik Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Pavel Kukuyan awards Tula a goal kick.
Tula are in shooting range from this free kick.
Throw-in for Tula close to the penalty box.
Alesandr Lomovitskiy (Tula) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Tula.
Free kick Tula.
Ball safe as Orenburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
He's off! Robert Bauer is shown a second yellow card.
Corner awarded to Orenburg.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rostoshi.
Goal! Orenburg extend their lead to 2-0 thanks to a Djordje Despotovic header.
That's a fine assist from Andrey Malykh.
Free kick for Tula in the half of Orenburg.
Evans Kangwa is replacing Sergey Tkachyov for the away team.
Tula push forward at Gazovik Stadium and Evans Kangwa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Orenburg defence.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Tula close to the penalty box.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a Tula throw-in in Orenburg's half.
In Rostoshi a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Orenburg's Joel Fameyeh has been booked in Rostoshi.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Tula in their own half.
Orenburg have been awarded a corner by Pavel Kukuyan.
Tula have a goal kick.
Attention is being given to Tulaâ€™s Evans Kangwa and play has been suspended briefly.
The home team have replaced Ricardo Alves with Fedor Cernych. This is the third substitution made today by Konstantin Emelianov.
Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tula's Evans Kangwa is back in action after a slight knock.
Fedor Cernych (Orenburg) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Sergey Terekhov (Orenburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Filip Rogic of Orenburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Tula at Gazovik Stadium.
Orenburg's Joel Fameyeh gets in a shot on goal at Gazovik Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in high up the field for Orenburg in Rostoshi.
Pavel Kukuyan signals a free kick to Tula.
Throw-in for Tula in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Rostoshi.
Throw-in for Tula in the half of Orenburg.
Tula to take a throw-in in Orenburg territory.
That's full-time at Gazovik Stadium. The final score is 2-0.
Timur Ayupov (Orenburg) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
